data.summary_suggestion: Find trap streets at specified address
data.description_suggestion: Searches for trap streets (fictitious streets used for copyright protection) at the specified address across Google Maps, Bing Maps, and OpenStreetMap data. Accepts a street address as input and returns a list of trap streets found at that location, including their presence in each mapping service. Trap streets are intentionally placed errors used by map providers to detect unauthorized copying of their map data.
